channel.title: Aaron Lohmann
channel.description: A personal website of Aaron Lohmann. Statistician and economist.

item.title: Reading Course in Statistical Sciences
item.description: A reading course in statistical sciences held in the summer term of 2023 at university Bielefeld. Taking the wonderful book Causal Inference - The Mixtape by Scott Cunningham as a structuring guideline. Students had to present one method in each week and we discussed empirical papers applying these techniques all together.
